Home Owner's Associations - Heritage Harbor Golf and Country Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Heritage Harbor Golf and Country Club Lutz, FL Home Golf Course Info Scorecard Hole by Hole Tee Times Facilities Golf Facilities Practice Facilities Pro Shop Double Bogey’s Tavern & Grille Heritage Harbor Golf and Country Club Lutz, FL Lessons Events Outings & Events Tournament Info Request Outing Info SRK Camp HOA Community Development Community Event Calendar HOA Info Home Owner’s Associations Architectural Information HOA Member Area Neighbors Helping Neighbors HOA Documents HOA Meeting Minutes For Sale/For Rent Sign Guidelines Contact Contact Join the Harbor’s E-Club Directions to Heritage Harbor Staff Listing ADA Compliance & Accessibility Home Owner’s Associations ———————————————————————————————————– Heritage Harbor Golf & Country Club is a community of 669 single family homes. Our community is sub-divided into the “villages” of Bridgeport, Brightwater, Bluewater, Monterey Bay, Sea Cove, New Haven and Kings Gate. Our community and Homeowners’ Association is governed by a five-member Board of Directors who conduct monthly Board meetings and one annual meeting each year. Current officers President-Kumar Ganesan Vice President-Marcus Brugger Treasurer-Jeff Witt Secretary-Melissa Chevalier Director-Vibhara Srivastava Hours for HOA amenities Fitness Room: 5:00 AM – 10:00 PM Tennis Courts: 5:00 AM – 10:00 PM Pool: 7:00 AM – 9:00 PM Pool slide: 9:00 AM – 9:00 PM Heritage Harbor is professionally managed by Greenacre Properties Inc. Greenacre is an Accredited Association Management Company as awarded by Community Associations Institute , which is a national organization whose primary focus is education for homeowners, board members, managers, vendors and professionals who provide a service to their communities. Greenacre Properties is headquartered in Tampa. Heritage Harbor is managed by Ray Leonard. Homeowners may contact Ray regarding architectural control and deed restriction concerns or questions( rleonard@greenacre.com ). Ray is on-site weekly to review the property to ensure compliance of the deed restrictions and architectural control as set forth in the recorded Declaration of Covenants, Conditions and Restrictions and/or Guidelines set forth by the Board of Directors. Homeowners are required to submit for approval from the Design Review Board for any exterior modifications to their home or home site. This includes, but is not limited to: fencing, screen enclosures, pools, spas, landscaping, color changes, window/door changes, roofing, etc. ( See Home Improvement Application ) ( See architectural guidelines, standards and criteria ) The members in Heritage Harbor pay a monthly HOA assessment that is collected by Greenacre Properties. These fees are paid with a payment coupon that is sent along to the Association’s bank with the homeowner’s check. Any homeowner who does not have payment coupons should contact Carmen Del Pilar at Greenacre Properties immediately to request them; cdelpilar@greenacre.com or (813) 936-4162. Unless duly noted otherwise, the Board of Directors primarily holds meetings on the last Wednesday of every other month at the clubhouse library, starting at 6:30pm. Page Footer Contact Us Address : 19502 Heritage Harbor Pkwy Lutz, FL, 33558 Email : hhcluboffice@gmail.com Phone : 813-949-6841 Facebook Local Weather Copyright © 2025 Heritage Harbor Golf and Country Club All Rights Reserved. Powered by

Heritage Bay - Naples Golf Homes | Naples Golf Guy Property Search Golf Communities Naples Bonita Springs / Estero Fort Myers Greater Sarasota Bundled Equity Luxury Buyers Sellers Discover SWFL FAQ’s Dinning & Entertainment Shopping Beaches Calendar of Events Golf Accommodations Healthcare Arts & Attractions About Us Naples Golf Guy Team Downing Frye Realty Contact Us Testimonials Blog Property Search Golf Communities Naples Bonita Springs / Estero Fort Myers Greater Sarasota Bundled Equity Luxury Buyers Sellers Discover SWFL FAQ’s Dinning & Entertainment Shopping Beaches Calendar of Events Golf Accommodations Healthcare Arts & Attractions About Us Naples Golf Guy Team Downing Frye Realty Contact Us Testimonials Blog 239.370.0892 info@naplesgolfguy.com Back to Naples Golf Communities Heritage Bay Heritage Bay is a bundled golf community located in North Naples, Florida. The golf course features 27 holes and was designed by Gordon Lewis and Jed Azinger. Additionally, the fairways are wide open and the greens are quite large. Moreover, the club features a resort-style pool with a full-service outdoor restaurant. Also, the clubhouse has an updated Grille room overlooking the golf course. Members can enjoy a casual dining option for members to enjoy after a round of golf. Beyond golf, club amenities include 7 Har-Tru tennis courts, a fitness center, pickleball courts, bocce courts, and a full social calendar! Finally, the golf course is surrounded by 1,250 single-family homes and condos. Since this is a bundled golf community, your golf membership is included in the purchase of your home or condo. Therefore, your golf dues are included with your regular community fees. Bottom Line The Naples Golf Guy Team specializes in helping buyers and sellers with their real estate needs in Southwest Florida Golf Communities. Contact us today for more information. Location: Naples Florida Club Type: Private Country Club Membership Type: Bundled Golf Community Real Estate Single Family: $900,000 – $1,999,000 View Homes for Sale Condos: $349,000 – $820,000 View Condos for Sale The Naples Golf Guy Team has more than 20 years of experience helping Buyers and Sellers with their real estate needs in Southwest Florida golf communities. Call, text, or email us today for more information. Stay informed with automatic property alerts… Learn what your home is worth… Sign up for our monthly market report Membership Information Maximum Number of Golf Memberships 1250 Golf Memberships Is a Golf Membership Required? Yes Non-Resident Memberships Available? No Membership Fees Golf Membership Initiation Fees: Bundled Annual Golf Dues: $9,642 Annual Social Membership Fee: Bundled Annual Social Dues: N/A In bundled golf communities, the Golf or Social membership is included with the purchase of your home. Additionally, there are annual recurring fees associated with the property, as well as one-time fees due at the time of purchase. Potential Fees Include: Master HOA Fee (Annual) Neighborhood HOA Fee (Annual) Food and Beverage Minimum (Annual) Assessments (Annual) Capital Contribution Fee (one-time) Transfer Fee (one-time) Application Fee (one-time) These fees vary by neighborhood within the community. Please feel free to contact us for additional information. Information about the tees and membership change over time. Please feel free to email us at info@naplesgolfguy.com if you see any information that needs to be corrected. Stay in the know by subscribing to our newsletter Enter your email address 239.370.0892 info@naplesgolfguy.com ©2025 Naples Golf Guy Privacy Policy Accessiblity made by exploritech We serve cookies to analyze traffic and customize content on this site. Privacy & Cookie Policy Got It! Manage consent Close Privacy Overview This website uses cookies to improve your experience while you navigate through the website. Out of these, the cookies that are categorized as necessary are stored on your browser as they are essential for the working of basic functionalities of the website. We also use third-party cookies that help us analyze and understand how you use this website. These cookies will be stored in your browser only with your consent. You also have the option to opt-out of these cookies. But opting out of some of these cookies may affect your browsing experience. Necessary Necessary Always Enabled Necessary cookies are absolutely essential for the website to function properly. These cookies ensure basic functionalities and security features of the website, anonymously. Cookie Duration Description cookielawinfo-checkbox-analytics 11 months This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookie is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Analytics". cookielawinfo-checkbox-functional 11 months The cookie is set by GDPR cookie consent to record the user consent for the cookies in the category "Functional". cookielawinfo-checkbox-necessary 11 months This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookies is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Necessary". cookielawinfo-checkbox-others 11 months This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookie is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Other. cookielawinfo-checkbox-performance 11 months This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookie is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Performance". viewed_cookie_policy 11 months The cookie is set by the GDPR Cookie Consent plugin and is used to store whether or not user has consented to the use of cookies. It does not store any personal data. Functional Functional Functional cookies help to perform certain functionalities like sharing the content of the website on social media platforms, collect feedbacks, and other third-party features. Performance Performance Performance cookies are used to understand and analyze the key performance indexes of the website which helps in delivering a better user experience for the visitors. Analytics Analytics Analytical cookies are used to understand how visitors interact with the website. These cookies help provide information on metrics the number of visitors, bounce rate, traffic source, etc. Advertisement Advertisement Advertisement cookies are used to provide visitors with relevant ads and marketing campaigns. These cookies track visitors across websites and collect information to provide customized ads. Others Others Other uncategorized cookies are those that are being analyzed and have not been classified into a category as yet. SAVE & ACCEPT

Heritage Bay Naples Real Estate: 16 Condos for Sale SIGN IN SAVED 0 Luxury Of Naples Group at Premiere Plus Realty Heritage Bay Naples Florida Condos for Sale Heritage Bay Naples Real Estate Homes For Sale 5 $299K - $1.4M Condos For Sale 16 $280K - $665K Sold ( Past 6 Months ) 38 $275K - $1.3M Last updated at 9:32pm 09/10/2025 COMMUNITIES MLS SEARCH MAP SEARCH NEW LISTINGS COMMERCIAL CONTACT US NAPLES BONITA SPRINGS MARCO ISLAND Heritage Bay Naples Real Estate : 16 Condos for Sale Main Naples Real Estate Heritage Bay Condos for Sale 1 - 24 of 45 Previous 1 2 Next HOMES CONDOS MAP Save this Search Compare Properties Listings Per Page 12 Listings Per Page 24 Listings Per Page 48 Listings Per Page Send Me Updates Subdivision All Subdivisions Terrace The Vistas Sort By Price - High to Low Price - Low to High Living Area - High to Low Living Area - Low to High On Site Since - High to Low On Site Since - Low to High $665,000 Decrease* $34K View Details Heritage Bay 10610 Smokehouse Bay Dr # 102 , Naples , FL 34120 Condos - 1,883 ft² / 2,515 ft² - 2 Car Garage 3 Bed / 2 Baths Built 2011 Heritage Bay Naples Condos for Sale: Welcome to this beautifully updated 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom coach home, perfectly situated in a premier golf community with FULL GOLF MEMBERSHIP. Enjoy serene, panoramic views of a large tranquil lake, where each evening you can unwind while taking in stunning sunsets. The spacious, open-concept floor plan is ideal for both relaxing and entertaining, with abundant natural light pouring through large windows and sliding doors that lead to a private screened lanai. The updated kitchen boasts modern cabinetry, sleek quartz countertops, newer appliances and farm sink making it a chef’s dream. The expansive master suite is a peaceful retreat, complete with an en-suite bathroom featuring dual vanities and a walk-in shower. Two additional generously sized bedrooms provide ample space for family or guests. Other updates include plantation shutters throughout, room darkening, motorized blinds in the living room and primary bedroom, extra attic storage and new epoxy floor in the 2-car garage. As a resident of Heritage Bay Golf and Country Club you will enjoy a 27hole championship course, a world-class clubhouse, all new 'Grille Room' restaurant & bar overlooking the 27th green, a resort-style pool with a Cabana Restaurant & Bar and a formal dining room for special events. Amenities include 7 HAR-TRU tennis courts, pickleball courts, bocce courts, four quiet satellite pools, fitness center, full-time activities director & more giving you full access to world-class facilities and lush fairways. Located just minutes from shopping, dining, and all the best amenities, this home offers an exceptional lifestyle in a highly sought-after location. Don’t miss your chance to own this rare gem! $599,000 View Details Heritage Bay 10020 Siesta Bay Dr # 9026 , Naples , FL 34120 Condos - 1,661 ft² / 1,993 ft² - 1 Car Garage 3 Bed / 2 Baths Built 2010 Heritage Bay Naples Condos for Sale: Extremely rare top-floor end unit with 3 full bedrooms and no side neighbor, featuring an incredible southern lake view! This unique residence comes fully turnkey and move-in ready for an effortless move, complete with a FULL golf membership to Heritage Bay’s 27-hole championship golf course. The "Abbey" model Veranda condo features a 1-car detached garage, front AND back screened lanai, and this one has the traditional den/office closed into a bedroom, transforming the layout into a true 3-bedroom condo. Flooded with natural light and offering peaceful southern lake views, this condo has hurricane impact glass and sliders, and was recently refreshed with a newer A/C (2020), freshly painted walls & cabinets with new hardware, and modern furniture and fixtures. Heritage Bay boasts a stunning 27-hole Lewis-Azinger designed golf course and aqua driving range. The grand clubhouse features diverse dining options, elegant event spaces, and a lively social scene. Dine at The Grille Room, a casual indoor/outdoor bar and restaurant with an incredible southern view of the 27th green. Members enjoy a resort-style pool area with heated spa, plus ‘The Cabana’ poolside bar & grille offering a full-service kitchen. The community also offers a top-notch tennis program with 7 har-tru clay courts, pickleball (4 more being added with no assessment) & bocce courts, and a state-of-the-art fitness center. With a calendar full of events and activities, Heritage Bay delivers a vibrant, luxurious lifestyle—whether you’re a golf enthusiast or simply seeking serene golf & nature views and elevated living. These condos are super easy to rent in winter at $7500+ a month, which covers all of your costs! $599,000 View Details Heritage Bay 10068 Siesta Bay Dr # 9716 , Naples , FL 34120 Condos - 1,661 ft² / 1,993 ft² - 1 Car Garage 2+Den / 2 Baths Built 2012 Heritage Bay Naples Condos for Sale: Golf membership is INCLUDED with this gorgeous first floor, end unit "Abbey" model veranda condo, featuring a stunning southern golf and lake view. The Abbey model is wide & spacious with lots of extra windows for tons of natural light! This condo has been well-maintained and upgraded: freshly painted, added LVP flooring in the bedrooms, wood plank tile in the den, and modern fixtures throughout. The entire condo is hurricane impact glass and sliders for added peace of mind! Heritage Bay features a stunning 27-hole Lewis-Azinger designed golf course and aqua driving range. The grand clubhouse offers diverse dining options, elegant event spaces, and a lively social scene. Have a bite to eat in The Grille Room— a casual indoor/outdoor bar & dining area, with an incredible southern view of the 27th green. Members can also enjoy a resort-style pool area with heated spa & 'The Cabana' poolside bar & grille with a full service kitchen. The community also includes a top-notch tennis program with 7 har-tru clay courts, pickleball & bocce courts, and a state-of-the-art fitness center. With a calendar full of events and activities, Heritage Bay ensures a vibrant and luxurious lifestyle for its members. Whether you're a golf enthusiast or simply looking for serene views and luxury living, Heritage Bay offers it all. 2019 special assessment for amenities renovations paid in FULL $599,000 Decrease* $21K View Details Heritage Bay 10020 Siesta Bay Dr # 9016 , Naples , FL 34120 Condos - 1,661 ft² / 1,661 ft² - 1 Car Garage 2+Den / 2 Baths Built 2010 Heritage Bay Naples Condos for Sale: Experience the ultimate in resort-style living in this beautifully updated, turnkey, Abbey end-unit Veranda, ideally located at the private and peaceful end of Boulder Lake. This light-filled 2-bedroom + den, 2-bathroom home is one of the most sought-after floor plans in Heritage Bay Golf and Country Club, with the added benefit of a window in the den that enhances the natural light and provides easy access to the guest bathroom—perfect for hosting family and friends. Step inside to discover an updated kitchen, featuring custom white painted cabinetry, added storage, elegant new granite countertops, a stylish tile backsplash, updated lighting and hardware, and counter-height bar seating ideal for casual dining or entertaining. A dry bar with matching granite surface adds a touch of sophistication to your living space. The primary bedroom features newer upgraded carpeting and the en suite bathroom has been fully renovated with granite countertops, a tub surround, a new shower, frameless glass shower door, and new flooring—all designed with both comfort and style in mind. White cabinetry flows throughout the home, tying each space together with a cohesive, clean look. Enjoy your morning coffee or evening wine from the rear tiled lanai, offering serene views and a quiet escape. With a newer HVAC system and a recently replaced flat-tile roof, this home offers both peace of mind and long-term energy efficiency—an ideal combination of comfort and value. Located just steps from one of five satellite pools, with plenty of guest parking nearby, you’ll find both convenience and tranquility here. The Heritage Bay Enhancement Project assessment has been paid in full, so you can enjoy the enhanced resort without additional cost. As a resident of the bundled community of Heritage Bay, your social calendar will be brimming with possibilities—from 27 holes of championship golf to tennis, pickleball, bocce, a staffed fitness center, and a full-time activities director who ensures there's always something happening. Unwind at the resort-style pool, where the outdoor Cabana offers full-service dining, or gather with friends in the newly expanded Grille Room—ideal for both elegant evenings and casual get-togethers. Whether your passion is golf, racquet sports, fitness, fine dining, or simply having fun, Heritage Bay has it all. Don’t miss the opportunity to own in one of Naples’ most vibrant and amenity-rich gated communities. $530,000 View Details Heritage Bay 10026 Siesta Bay Dr # 9113 , Naples , FL 34120 Condos - 1,414 ft² / 1,414 ft² - 1 Car Garage 2+Den / 2 Baths Built 2011 Heritage Bay Naples Condos for Sale: Live where every day feels like vacation - welcome to Heritage Bay Golf & Country Club! Step into vibrant, resort-style living with this updated and move-in ready 2-bedroom + den, 2-bath Veranda, perfectly located on the first floor with southern exposure and stunning Boulder Lake views. Designed for those who appreciate both relaxing and entertaining, you'll find bright, open living spaces with tile throughout, including both the front and back lanais - perfect for morning coffee or sunset happy hours with friends. The chef-inspired kitchen is ready for your next gathering, featuring new stainless appliances, custom-painted cabinets, granite countertops with breakfast bar seating, under-cabinet lighting, and designer fixtures. Host with confidence thanks to the hurricane-rated screen and outdoor TV cover on the back lanai screened with new no-see-um screens - enjoy the game or a movie night alfresco without worry. The flexible den is currently set up as a cozy media room, but easily doubles as guest space for visiting friends and family. Modern updates continue throughout, including new lighting, floating entertainment center, plantation shutters, upgraded bathrooms, and a laundry room with new washer/dryer and built-in storage. Located just steps from a satellite pool and your own detached garage, convenience is key - whether you're heading out for a round of golf or a night at the club. As a resident of Heritage Bay, your social calendar will be full with 27 holes of championship golf, tennis, pickleball, bocce, a staffed fitness center, and a full-time activities director keeping the events coming. Relax at the resort-style pool with an outdoor Cabana offering full-service dining, or dine and mingle in the newly expanded Grille Room, perfect for both upscale evenings and laid-back get-togethers. Whether you're into golf, racquet sports, fitness, food, or fun - Heritage Bay delivers! Don't miss your chance to own in one of Naples' most exciting gated communities. Schedule your private showing today and join the lifestyle you've been waiting for! $529,000 View Details Heritage Bay NEW 10250 Heritage Bay Blvd # 3622 , Naples , FL 34120 Condos - 1,414 ft² / 1,717 ft² - 1 Car Garage 2+Den / 2 Baths Built 2007 Heritage Bay Naples Condos for Sale: Enjoy gorgeous sunrise water and golf views from your back lanai in this top floor, FULLY RENOVATED "Coastal Contemporary" themed Veranda condo at Heritage Bay, Naples' premier bundled golf community. Golf membership is INCLUDED, and no detail has been spared, with upgrades including: NEW A/C 2024; kitchen & both bathrooms updated with white cabinets & "Ocean Beige" quartz countertops; matching Whirlpool kitchen appliances & Maytag washer and dryer; hurricane IMPACT glass and sliders throughout. Offered fully TURNKEY & move in ready, with high quality furnishings from Lazyboy, Matter Brothers, and Hammary. The "Barrington" model features 2 beds + den, 2 baths, a screened front + back lanai, and a one-car garage, and this one is located extremely close to the clubhouse (less than 1/3 mi!) and all of the resort-style amenities, restaurants, and sports! Heritage Bay features a stunning 27-hole Lewis-Azinger designed golf course and aqua driving range. The grand clubhouse offers diverse dining options, elegant event spaces, and a lively social scene. Have a bite to eat in The Grille Room— a casual indoor/outdoor bar & dining area, with an incredible southern view of the 27th green. Members can also enjoy a resort-style pool area with heated spa & 'The Cabana' poolside bar & grille with a full service kitchen. The community also includes a top-notch tennis program with 7 har-tru clay courts, pickleball & bocce courts, and a state-of-the-art fitness center. With a calendar full of events and activities, Heritage Bay ensures a vibrant and luxurious lifestyle for its members. Whether you're a golf enthusiast or simply looking for serene views and luxury living, Heritage Bay offers it all! $519,000 View Details Heritage Bay 10316 Heritage Bay Blvd # 2712 , Naples , FL 34120 Condos - 1,414 ft² / 1,717 ft² - 1 Car Garage 2+Den / 2 Baths Built 2010 Heritage Bay Naples Condos for Sale: Welcome to 10316 Heritage Bay Blvd #2712, a stunning 2?bedroom + den, 2?bathroom Veranda condo with garage nestled within the prestigious gated Heritage Bay Golf & Country Club in North Naples, FL. This first-floor unit offers serene views overlooking a picturesque pond and the championship golf course—a perfect blend of comfort and elegance. UPDATED KITCHEN including extended counter height Quartz counter tops, white cabinets, new refrigerator and microwave range hood. Newer HVAC (2021) and water heater (2025) and all new wood laminated flooring in the bedrooms and den.Large tile on diagonal and crown molding add to the finishes of this beautifully maintained home. $498,000 View Details Heritage Bay NEW 10250 Heritage Bay Blvd # 3615 , Naples , FL 34120 Condos - 1,414 ft² / 1,717 ft² - 1 Car Garage 2+Den / 2 Baths Built 2007 Heritage Bay Naples Condos for Sale: Invest in your golf lifestyle with returns that go beyond the green. Own a Slice of Paradise with Built-In Income Potential! This isn't just a golf getaway - it's a high-performing income asset in a prime Naples location. This beautifully maintained first-floor condo offers the ultimate combination of resort-style living with proven rental income for many years. Located in the exclusive Heritage Bay Golf & Country Club, this turnkey furnished residence is ideal for personal enjoyment, a smart investment, or both. This home attracts renters even in the summer and fall months, and can form part of a sophisticated investment plan for the smart golfer. Leases already secured for season 2026.
